name: Orc Quest - Early Access
description:
OrC Quest is incremental, story driven orc simulator thingy...possibly.

You are Orc, dreaming of taking over the world using goblins. And maybe, find other orcs.

This is still in development and far from release. So play it and let me know how it plays. What was fun and if you encountered any interesting bugs.

This game is meant to be played on the mobile platform, so I also added downloadable apk. But, to make testing easier, you can play it in the browser.
